mapper.sql: id, mobile_prefix, mobile_number, province, city, mobile_type, area_code, post_code, isp
mapper.select:
select
from mobile_data where mobile_number like concat('%',#{mobileNumber},'%' )
mapper.insert:
insert into mobile_data
id,
mobile_prefix,
mobile_number,
province,
city,
mobile_type,
area_code,
post_code,
isp,

mapper.update:
update mobile_data
mobile_prefix = #{mobilePrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_number = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_type = #{mobileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isp = #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mobile_data set mobile_prefix = #{mobilePrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_type = #{mobileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isp = #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
